title: Cant start The program
body: I just downloaded league today, but when i try to click on the icon to start it, it says there is a problem that wont let it start. And when i click debug, it uses microsoft visual studio to debug it. Whats the problem?

replies.body: Your client may have crashed in the background, so I suggest doing a pc restart just in case something isn't responding.  If the patcher isn't loading then there may also be a pc setting blocking it from opening.  Go over the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore that access.  I hope that helps!
